testcase.name: Check login is successful with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given the browser is open...................................................passed And user is on the login page...............................................passed When user enters the Michael and 12345......................................passed And clicks on the login button..............................................passed Then user is navigated to the home page.....................................passed
